"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f4298b6368724f93980100#post_53f4298b6368724f93980100
Bit of a bad example in that analogy. A lot of rock, especially metal draws heavily from classical and operatic roots.

A better example would be a different kind of rock, specifically punk rock as compared to a classical score.
